scraped_articles.title: Cillian Murphy Actually Learned Physics In Dutch For Oppenheimer
scraped_articles.meta_description: Cillian Murphy Actually Learned Physics In Dutch For Oppenheimer
scraped_articles.content:
Cillian Murphy Actually Learned Physics In Dutch For Oppenheimer

Cillian Murphy Actually Learned Physics In Dutch For Oppenheimer

Cillian Murphy revealed that she learned Dutch fluently for an Oppenheimer scene.

The actor plays J. Robert Oppenheimer in Christopher Nolan's biographical epic about the making of the atomic bomb this summer. The movie grossed $500 million (£392 million) at the global box office, making it the most successful WW2 movie ever.

In a new venue, the book Unleashing Oppenheimer: Inside Christopher Nolan's Explosive Atomic Age Thriller, Murphy admits to being "terrified" of learning the "little scene" in Dutch for the movie.

He explained: "I remember talking to Chris [Nolan, director] in pre-production and saying, 'Chris, what do you want to do about this Dutch scene?' And he said, 'What are you going to do about this Dutch scene?'"

The Star Peak Spy added that Nolan always "works to the best of his ability, so he expects everyone to do their job, does their due diligence". Murphy has previously worked with Nolan's Birth, Dunkirk, and the Dark Knight film trilogy.

Nolan's full-time cinematographer Hoyte van Hoytema, who is Dutch, assisted Murphy on the scene. Murphy asked van Hoytema to film him reading the lecture. "He recorded it and then I slowed it down so I only learned it phonetically for three months."

He went on to say that now, it's "one of those things I'll never forget because I did it so many times" and he "can still say it".

Speaking to NME recently, Murphy said he likes playing characters who are "unknowable, ambiguous, somewhat mysterious,"

He also adding: "To me that's what human life is: a complicated, weird gray area... The lives of good people are not interesting at all."

In a five-star review of Oppenheimer, NME wrote that the film is "not simply the definitive story of the man behind the atomic bomb" but a "monumental achievement in adult filmmaking."

scraped_articles.title: 5 Oldest Temples in Thailand that Still Exist: Discover the Timeless Wonder
scraped_articles.meta_description: Thailand is famous for its awesome temples. It showcases the country's deep-rooted spirituality.
scraped_articles.content:
5 Oldest Temples in Thailand that Still Exist: Discover the Timeless Wonder

Thailand is a land of rich cultural heritage. Thailand is famous for its awesome temples. It showcases the country's deep-rooted spirituality. Steeped in history, these temples prove Thailand's ancient traditions and architectural brilliance. In this article, we will travel through time. We explore five of Thailand's oldest temples. It has withstood the test of time, preserving its glory and uniqueness.

5 Oldest Temples in Thailand that Still Exist: Discover the Timeless Wonder

It is located in the hills overlooking Chiang Mai. Wat Phra That Doi Suthep is one of Thailand's most holy and respected temples. Built in 1383, the temple blesses a holy relic of Lord Buddha. It's a golden chedi (stupa). Wat Phra That Doi Suthep is decorated with complex carvings and surrounded by snake-like staircases.

1. Wat Phra That Doi Suthep

Wat Phra That Doi Suthep

These offer breathtaking panoramic views of the city. The temple's detailed architecture, wonderful murals, and calming aura. They make it a must-visit destination for spiritual seekers and cultural lovers alike.

It is situated in the heart of Chiang Mai's old city. Wat Chedi Luang dates back to the 14th century. This colossal temple once housed the Emerald Buddha. It is Thailand's most sacred icon. Although partially ruined, the towering chedi is still an awe-inspiring sight.

2. Wat Chedi Luang

Wat Chedi Luang

Wat Chedi Luang showcases the Lanna Kingdom's craftsmanship. With its rich historical significance and spiritual aura, Wat Chedi Luang serves as a hub for religious ceremonies and cultural events. It allows visitors to immerse themselves into Thailand's rich traditions.

It is located in the ancient city of Chiang Mai. Wat Phra Singh is home to the Phra Singh Buddha image. Known for its beauty and artistry, it is an admired statue. Built in the 14th century, this temple features a blend of Lanna and Thai architectural styles. It has ornate decorations and a gold-covered rooftop.

3. Wat Phra Singh

Wat Phra Singh

With old trees and complex pavilions, the temple grounds are peaceful and calm. They offer a peaceful place for meditation and contemplation. Wat Phra Singh is not only a religious center. It is also a cultural heritage site that showcases the luxury of Thai craftsmanship.

It is situated in Ayutthaya, the ancient capital of Thailand. Wat Mahathat is a significant archaeological site. It holds up to the glorious past of the Ayutthaya Kingdom. It was constructed in the 14th century. This temple complex was once a majestic center of Buddhist learning.

4. Wat Mahathat

Wat Mahathat

The iconic feature of Wat Mahathat is the Buddha's head nestled within the roots of a banyan tree. It makes a mesmerizing and delightful sight. Exploring the ruins of this temple allows visitors to look into Thailand's historical legacy. You will marvel at its ancient architectural wonders.

It is located in Nakhon Pathom, just outside Bangkok. Wat Phra Pathom Chedi is accepted as the tallest stupa in the world. It stands at an extraordinary height of 127 meters. Dating back to the 4th century, this temple holds a colossal history. Wat Phra Pathom Chedi also has religious significance in Thai Buddhism. The towering stupa is covered in gold leaf.

5. Wat Phra Pathom Chedi

Wat Phra Pathom Chedi

The landscape is dominated by it, and it serves as a symbol of spirituality. The temple complex also houses various shrines, pagodas, and meditation halls. These create a peaceful environment for devotees and visitors. So they can connect with their inner selves.

Oldest Temples in Thailand that Still Exist

Thailand's ancient temples are architectural marvels. They are also significant cultural and spiritual landmarks. The five temples mentioned above have stood the test of time. They preserve their historical sense and attract countless visitors from around the world. Exploring these temples allows us to appreciate intricate craftsmanship, and immerse ourselves in Thai traditions. Experience the calm and peace these holy sites offer. As you travel through Thailand, make sure to include these wonders on your list. Get an unforgettable cultural and spiritual experience.

scraped_articles.title: 7 Most Iconic Stephen Chow Movies That Will Make You Laugh Out Loud
scraped_articles.meta_description: Here are some of the most iconic Stephen Chow movies that will make you laugh out loud.
scraped_articles.content:
7 Most Iconic Stephen Chow Movies That Will Make You Laugh Out Loud

7 Most Iconic Stephen Chow Movies That Will Make You Laugh Out Loud

Stephen Chow is a legendary actor, director, and comedian known for his hilarious movies that never fail to make audiences laugh out loud.

From his slapstick humor to his witty one-liners, Chow's films are iconic in the world of comedy. Here are some of the best and most iconic Stephen Chow movies that will surely tickle your funny bone:

1. Kung Fu Hustle (2004)

(Watch on: Amazon Prime Video, Apple TV, and Vudu)

Kung Fu Hustle 

"Kung Fu Hustle" is a martial arts comedy film that follows the story of Sing, a hapless wannabe gangster who stumbles upon a neighborhood full of kung fu masters. As chaos ensues, Sing must discover his own hidden potential to save the day. Stephen Chow's performance as Sing is both hilarious and endearing, making this film a must-watch for fans of action and comedy.

2. Shaolin Soccer (2001)

(Watch on: Amazon Prime Video, Apple TV, and Vudu)

Shaolin Soccer 

In "Shaolin Soccer," Chow plays a down-and-out soccer player who teams up with his martial arts brothers to form a soccer team like no other. With gravity-defying kicks and over-the-top special effects, this movie is a riot from start to finish. Chow's comedic timing and physical humor shine through in every scene, making this film a cult classic among audiences worldwide.

3. From Beijing With Love (1994)

(Watch on: Amazon Prime Video, Apple TV, and Vudu)

From Beijing With Love 

"From Beijing With Love" is a spy spoof film that follows the misadventures of a bumbling secret agent on a mission to recover a stolen dinosaur skull. Chow's portrayal of the clueless agent is both charming and laugh-out-loud funny as he navigates through a world of espionage with his signature hilarious antics.

4. Fight Back to School (1991)

(Watch on: Amazon Prime Video and Apple TV)

Fight Back to School 

"Fight Back to School" is a comedy film that sees Chow playing a goofy cop who goes undercover as a high school student to solve a murder mystery. With his over-the-top disguises and outrageous antics, Chow delivers a performance that is both entertaining and heartwarming. This film is a perfect showcase of Chow's comedic talents and ability to keep audiences laughing till the very end.

5. Flirting Scholar (1993)

(Watch on: Apple TV)

Flirting Scholar 

"Flirting Scholar" is a romantic comedy film that follows the story of a scholar who falls in love with a beautiful maiden. Chow's portrayal of the lovestruck scholar is filled with slapstick humor and witty charm, making this film a delightful watch for fans of romance and comedy. With its quirky characters and hilarious situations, "Flirting Scholar" is a timeless classic in Chow's filmography.

6. King of Comedy (1999)

(This movie is not available for streaming.)

King of Comedy 

In "King of Comedy," Chow plays a struggling actor who dreams of making it big in show business. With his trademark humor and impeccable timing, Chow delivers a performance that is both heartwarming and side-splitting. As he navigates the ups and downs of the entertainment industry, audiences are treated to a rollercoaster of laughs and emotions that only Stephen Chow can deliver.

7. All for the Winner (1990)

All for the Winner

"All for the Winner" is a comedy film that sees Chow playing a legendary gambler who uses his supernatural abilities to win big in the world of gambling. With his over-the-top antics and hilarious gags, Chow keeps audiences entertained from start to finish. This film showcases Chow's comedic genius and ability to bring laughter to audiences of all ages.

scraped_articles.title: One Piece Anime Series Will Have A Hiatus?
scraped_articles.meta_description: Toei animation, a studio that works on One Piece anime series, makes a hiatus announcement.
scraped_articles.content:
One Piece Anime Series Will Have A Hiatus?

Toei animation, a studio that works on One Piece anime series, makes a hiatus announcement.

One Piece Anime Series Will Have A Hiatus?

One Piece Anime will takes 6 months hiatus and will be replaced with a remastered version.

Recently, Toei animation, a studio that works on One Piece anime series, makes a hiatus announcement.

The long run anime series will have 6 months hiatus from October 13 this year to April next year.

This was done to celebrate One Piece anime 25th anniversarry.

ONE PIECE TV Anime will go on hiatus until April 2025 for a broadcast timeslots change.

The series will be airing a 'Fishman Island Re-Edition' until then. More info on the resuming of the series will be given in the future. pic.twitter.com/BKaVTe3yin

— Shonen Jump News (@WSJ_manga) October 13, 2024

Despite the hiatus, the One Piece anime will still be aired on the anniversarry.

In fact, according to IGN, Toei will air a remastered version of the Fisherman Island arc during the hiatus.

One Piece: Fish-Man Island Saga will air from 27 October this year to 30 March next year with new episodes coming every week.

This remastered version, which aired between 2011 and 2012, will consist of 21 episodes.

It will have reshot scenes plus new animated sequences, including the opening and closing themes which also features a new visual style and recorded in Dolby Atmos.

The new opening will be titled ‘We Go!’ and will be sung by Kitadani Hiroshi with the closing song titled ‘Sailing’ and will be sung by BE:FIRST.

"Set in the Sabaody Archipelago after the Paramount War, the story follows its protagonist, a young girl and admirer of Nami, as she sets off on a small adventure" the description reads.

scraped_articles.title: 100 Happy Birthday Wishes for Lover to Make Their Day Memorable
scraped_articles.meta_description: Are you looking for the best words to celebrate your partner's birthday? Check out these sweet, romantic, and funny birthday wishes for lover.
scraped_articles.meta_keywords: happy birthday wishes for lover,birthday wishes for boyfriend,birthday wishes for girlfriend
scraped_articles.content:
100 Happy Birthday Wishes for Lover to Make Their Day Memorable

Birthdays are special days for everyone, but they are especially important for your lover. Thinking of happy birthday wishes for lover is a great way to show how much you care. A thoughtful message can make their day brighter and show them your love.

Sending simple happy birthday wishes for lover can make your partner feel truly appreciated. A few kind words can show them that you remember their special day and value your time together. When they read your message, they will feel loved and cherished, knowing that you put thought into their birthday.

If you are looking for a good birthday message for your partner, you come to the right place. In this article, we have selected some of the best happy birthday wishes for lover from various sources, Thursday (7/11/2024). Whether it's sweet, funny, or romantic, you will find ideas to make your partner's day memorable.

The Best Happy Birthday Wishes for Lover

1. "Happy birthday to the person who makes my heart skip a beat and my days brighter."

2. "Another year around the sun with you by my side - I couldn't ask for anything more. Happy Birthday, love!"

3. "Your smile lights up my world. Today, I hope to make you smile more than ever. Happy Birthday!"

4. "Happy birthday to my best friend, my love, and my favorite person all wrapped in one."

5. "Every day with you feels special, but today is extra magical. Happy Birthday, dear!"

6. "Wishing the most wonderful birthday to the one who holds the key to my heart."

7. "You make every day feel like an adventure. Here's to another year of creating beautiful memories together. Happy Birthday!"

8. "To my partner in crime and partner in time - happy Birthday! Thank you for sharing your journey with me."

9. "Your love makes my life complete. Today, we celebrate you and all the joy you bring. Happy Birthday!"

10. "Happy birthday to the one who understands me without words and loves me without conditions."

11. "With you, every moment feels like a celebration. But today is extra special because it's all about you. Happy Birthday!"

12. "Your Birthday is my second favorite day - second only to the day we met. Happy Birthday, love!"

13. "Here's to another year of laughter, love, and endless possibilities together. Happy Birthday!"

14. "You deserve all the happiness in the world, and I'm here to make sure your Birthday is just the beginning. Happy Birthday!"

15. "Happy birthday to my favorite person to annoy, to cuddle with, and to love."

16. "Life with you is like a beautiful dream I never want to wake up from. Happy Birthday, my love!"

17. "To the one who makes my heart full and my life complete - happy birthday!"

18. "Celebrating another year of your amazing existence. Thank you for sharing your life with me. Happy Birthday!"

19. "Your love makes ordinary days extraordinary. Today is extra special because it's your Birthday!"

20. "Happy birthday to my rock, my inspiration, and my greatest love."

21. "You're not just a year older, you're a year more amazing. Happy Birthday to my wonderful partner!"

22. "Happy birthday to the one who makes my heart dance and my soul sing."

23. "Today we celebrate the day the universe brought my favorite person into existence. Happy Birthday, love!"

24. "Your Birthday is just another excuse for me to show you how much you mean to me. Happy Birthday!"

25. "To my present, my future, and everything in between - happy Birthday! Thank you for being you."

Funny Happy Birthday Wishes for Lover

1. "Happy birthday to someone who still looks hot even while eating spaghetti like a chaotic mess!"

2. "Congrats on being older than yesterday but younger than tomorrow! Happy Birthday to my favorite weirdo."

3. "You're not getting older, you're just becoming a limited edition human. Happy Birthday!"

4. "Happy Birthday to someone who still laughs at my terrible jokes. Your taste in humor is questionable, but your taste in partners is excellent!"

5. "I'd tell you you're getting better with age, but you've always been awesome. Happy Birthday, you show-off!"

6. "Happy Birthday! I'd give you all the stars in the sky, but glitter is cheaper and way more annoying."

7. "On your special day, I want you to know that you're my favorite pain in the neck. Happy Birthday!"

8. "Happy birthday to someone who's still hot enough to melt the candles on their cake!"

9. "You're like fine wine – you keep getting more expensive to maintain. Happy Birthday, love!"

10. "Happy Birthday! I promise to keep pretending that I'm listening when you talk about your favorite TV show."

11. "Congratulations on being another year closer to getting those senior citizen discounts! Happy Birthday!"

12. "Happy Birthday to my favorite snack stealer. Yes, I know it was you who ate my last cookie!"

13. "You're not old, you're just old enough to know all the lyrics to songs that are now considered classics. Happy Birthday!"

14. "Happy birthday to someone who still looks cute even with bed hair and morning breath!"

15. "Cheers to you on your Birthday! Remember, if you can't remember how old you are, then you're still young... or just really bad at math!"

16. "Happy Birthday! Thanks for always laughing at my jokes, even the ones that make everyone else cringe."

scraped_articles.title: 5 Health Benefits of Drinking Sodas
scraped_articles.meta_description: Soda is a carbonated drink that many people love for its refreshing taste.
scraped_articles.content:
5 Health Benefits of Drinking Sodas

5 Health Benefits of Drinking Sodas

Soda is a carbonated drink that many people love for its refreshing taste.

However, it is no secret that soft drinks have many adverse health effects such as diabetes, obesity, and others.

Even so, it turns out that there are some health benefits to carbonated drinks.

In this list, we will show you 5 health benefits by drinking soda!

Sodas contain a high amount of sugar, typically in the form of sucrose or high-fructose corn syrup. This sugar provides a rapid source of energy, which can be beneficial in situations where you need a quick pick-me-up, such as during intense physical activity or when experiencing low blood sugar levels.

Quick Energy Boost

Many sodas contain caffeine, which is a natural stimulant. In moderation, caffeine can help improve alertness and concentration. Some people may turn to caffeinated sodas for a mild energy boost or to combat drowsiness.

Increase Alertness and Concentration

Ginger ale, a type of soda, is sometimes used to alleviate nausea and motion sickness. The ginger flavor and carbonation may help soothe an upset stomach. However, ginger ale is not a replacement for medical treatment if nausea persists.

Nausea Relief

In very rare instances, a soda might be used as a rehydration solution in situations where no better options are available. The carbonation and sugar content can help with fluid absorption in cases of mild dehydration. However, for rehydration, solutions like oral rehydration salts are much more effective and recommended.

Rehydration

Some people find pleasure in consuming sodas in moderation as a treat or during social gatherings. While this doesn't offer direct health benefits, the enjoyment of such occasions can contribute to overall well-being.

Social Enjoyment

scraped_articles.title: Sister Love Quotes That Capture the Magic of Sisterhood
scraped_articles.meta_description: Reading sister love quotes will remind us of the times we've grown together.
scraped_articles.content:
Sister Love Quotes That Capture the Magic of Sisterhood

Reading sister love quotes will remind us of the times we've grown together. 

Sister Love Quotes That Capture the Magic of Sisterhood

Sisters share a special bond that is like no other. They can be best friends, partners in crime, and sometimes even rivals. However, through all the ups and downs, the love between sisters remains strong.

Many people have tried to capture this unique relationship through sister love quotes.They are words that highlight the fun, support, and love sisters share.

Sister love quotes can be funny, heartfelt, or full of wisdom.

They help us understand the joy of having a sister. Reading sister love quotes will also remind us of the times we've grown together. So let's explore some inspiring sister love quotes that celebrate the bond between sisters!

Funny Sister Love Quotes

• “Sisterly love means never having to say you’re sorry for eating the last cookie. You just understand.”

• “Sisterly love is like a good book: comforting, full of surprises, and hard to put down, especially when you get to the good parts.”

• “Loving your sister means understanding that ‘borrowing’ clothes without asking is just a form of flattery.”

• “A sister’s love is the only force capable of turning a bad day into a day filled with giggles and mischief.”

• “Loving a sister means sometimes communicating with just facial expressions and still understanding each other perfectly.”

• “A sister’s love is like Wi-Fi. You may not see it, but you know it’s always there and it keeps you connected.”

• “Sisters share a love that’s woven with memories, secrets, and the occasional squabble over who’s Mom’s favorite.”

• “Sisterly love is when you’ve seen each other at your worst, and you decide it’s hilarious.”

• “Loving a sister is like having a permanent stamp of approval, no matter how goofy you look.”

• “A sister’s love is like a beacon of light in the chaos of life, guiding you through with laughter and the occasional eye roll.”

• “Sisters love you even when you’re acting like yesterday’s leftovers. They might hold their noses, but they’ll still hang around.”

• “Having a sister means you have a forever friend who loves you even when you’re both being weirdos.”

• “The love for a sister is unique; it’s the kind of love where you can go from fighting over clothes to fighting for each other’s dreams.”

• “A sister’s love is like the ultimate safety net, made of giggles, secrets, and shared memories.”

Heartwarming Sister Love Quotes

• “The best thing about having a sister was that I always had a friend.” – Cali Rae Turner

• “To have a loving relationship with a sister is not simply to have a buddy or a confidant, it is to have a soulmate for life.” – Victoria Secunda

• “When you treasure your sister, you also treasure yourself.” – Dave Pipitone

• “Sisters share the scent and smells – the feel of a common childhood.” – Pam Brown

• “I would like more sisters, that the taking out of one, might not leave such stillness.” – Emily Dickinson

• “Your sister is a jewel, a priceless, one-of-a-kind gem who makes living precious for many people, including you.” – Dave Pipitone

• “What are sisters for if not to point out the things the rest of the world is too polite to mention.” – Claire Cook

• “When sisters stand shoulder to shoulder, who stands a chance against us?” – Pam Brown

• “Sisterhood is a funny thing. It’s easy to recognize, but hard to define.” – Pearl Cleage

• “Sweet is the voice of a sister in the season of sorrow.” – Benjamin Disraeli

“A sister is a little bit of childhood that can never be lost.” – Marion Garrety

Heartwarming Sister Love Quotes

• “Your sisters are the only people in the world who know what it’s like to have been brought up the way you were.” – Betsy Cohen

• “A sister is a gift to the heart, a friend to the spirit, a golden thread to the meaning of life.” – Isadora James

• “How do people make it through life without a sister?” – Sara Corpening

• “Sisters share a bond unlike any other – thornier, but also tender, full of possibility.” – Joy McCullough

• “Even though you are my little sister, your hugs during the difficult times in my life, have been like a hug from God.” – Kate Summers

• “An older sister is a friend and defender – a listener, conspirator, a counselor and a sharer of delights. And sorrows too.” – Pam Brown

• “She is the only person left in the world who shares my memories.” – Lisa See

• “A sister is like yourself in a different movie, a movie that stars you in a different life.” – Deborah Tannen

• “Is solace anywhere more comforting than that in the arms of a sister?” – Alice Walker

scraped_articles.title: 44 Viking Names : Exploring the Meanings Behind Them
scraped_articles.meta_description: The Vikings' legacy lives on through their names, each carrying a story of strength, wisdom, and adventure.
scraped_articles.content:
44 Viking Names : Exploring the Meanings Behind Them

As we explore these names, we connect with the rich tapestry of Norse culture and the enduring legacy of the Vikings. (Photo by StockCake-Viking Warrior Poise)

44 Viking Names: Exploring the Meanings Behind Them

The Vikings' legacy lives on through their names, each carrying a story of strength, wisdom, and adventure. The old Norse proverb says, "A name is the first gift parents give their child." Let's journey through time to explore 44 Viking names and their profound meanings.

Male Viking Names

1. Bjorn - Bear
> "The strongest of men is he who stands alone." - Old Norse Proverb

2. Erik - Eternal ruler
> "Where wolf's ears are, wolf's teeth are near." - Viking Saying

3. Ivar - Warrior with the bow
> "The brave man well shall fight and win, though dull his blade may be." - Hávamál

4. Leif - Heir or descendant
> "Better to fight and fall than to live without hope." - Viking Saying

5. Odin - Supreme god in Norse mythology
> "The fool thinks himself to be wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool." - Hávamál

6. Ragnar - Warrior of judgment
> "Cattle die, kindred die, we ourselves also die; but the fair fame never dies of him who has earned it." - Hávamál

7. Sven - Young warrior
> "A man is not called wise because he talks and talks again; but if he is peaceful, loving and fearless." - Hávamál

8. Thor - Thunder

> "Where you recognize evil, speak out against it, and give no truces to your enemies." - Viking Saying

9. Ulf - Wolf
> "A man must be better than his mouth." - Viking Saying

10. Viggo - War
> "The unwise man is awake all night, and ponders everything over; when morning comes he is weary in mind, and all is a burden as ever." - Hávamál

11. Finn - Fair or white
> "Fire is the best among the sons of men, and the sight of the sun." - Hávamál

Female Viking Names

12. Astrid - Divinely beautiful
> "Better to ask twice than to lose your way once." - Viking Saying

13. Freya - Goddess of love and beauty
> "Love is the meeting point of all things." - Viking Saying

14. Gerd - Enclosure or protected
> "A ship is safe in harbor, but that's not what ships are for." - Viking Saying

16. Ingrid - Beautiful
> "Where there is a will, there is a way." - Viking Saying

17. Kara - Wild, stormy one
> "The day has eyes, the night has ears." - Viking Saying

18. Liv - Life or protection
> "A child must be raised with kindness and praise." - Viking Saying

15. Helga - Holy or blessed> "The mind knows only what lies near the heart." - Viking Saying

20. Sigrid - Beautiful victory
> "A wise man's heart is seldom glad." - Viking Saying

21. Thyra - Thunder
> "He who does not save in youth, suffers want in age." - Viking Saying

22. Yrsa - Bear
> "A woman's advice is no small matter." - Viking Saying

19. Ragna - Advice or counsel> "The sea finds out everything you did wrong." - Viking Saying

Unisex Viking Names

23. Aki - Ancestor
> "The wolf and the dog do not play together." - Viking Saying

24. Ari - Eagle
> "A man's deeds follow him." - Viking Saying

25. Birger - One who helps
> "A tree does not fall at the first stroke." - Viking Saying

26. Dagny - New day
> "Even a small star shines in the darkness." - Viking Saying

27. Einar - One warrior

> "The path to glory is paved with daggers." - Viking Saying

28. Frode - Wise or clever
> "A wise man changes his mind, a fool never will." - Viking Saying

29. Gunnar - Brave warrior
> "A man is the master of his own fate." - Viking Saying

30. Hilda - Battle
> "A man's worth is measured by his courage." - Viking Saying

31. Inge - Protected by Ing (Norse god)
> "The gods help those who help themselves." - Viking Saying

Viking Names

33. Knut - Knot
> "A knotted rope is stronger than a single thread." - Viking Saying

34. Loki - Trickster god
> "Wisdom is welcome wherever it comes from." - Viking Saying

35. Magnus - Great
> "A great man is known by his deeds." - Viking Saying

32. Jorund - Sea warrior> "The sea is a cruel mistress." - Viking Saying

37. Olaf - Ancestor's descendant
> "The roots of wisdom are bitter, but its fruit is sweet." - Viking Saying

38. Rune - Secret lore
> "Knowledge is a burden, ignorance is bliss." - Viking Saying

39. Saga - Story or fairy tale
> "Every ending is a new beginning." - Viking Saying

36. Njal - Giant> "Even a giant must sleep." - Viking Saying

40. Toke - Thor's helmet

> "A warrior's strength lies not in his weapon, but in his heart." - Viking Saying

41. Ulf - Wolf
> "The lone wolf dies, but the pack survives." - Viking Saying

42. Valda - Power, rule
> "With great power comes great responsibility." - Viking Saying

43. Ylva - She-wolf
> "A wolf may lose its teeth, but never its nature." - Viking Saying

44. Zoe - Life
> "Life is a gift from the gods, use it wisely." - Viking Saying

They remind us of a time when names were more than mere labels—prophecies, hopes, and blessings bestowed upon a child. As we explore these names, we connect with the rich tapestry of Norse culture and the enduring legacy of the Vikings.

These Viking names, steeped in history and meaning, continue to inspire and captivate us today.

scraped_articles.title: Portraits Suni Lee, The Olympic Gold Medalist in Her Daily Life
scraped_articles.meta_description: She was the first Asian-American woman to win an Olympic overall title.
scraped_articles.content:
Portraits Suni Lee, The Olympic Gold Medalist in Her Daily Life

She was the first Asian-American woman to win an Olympic overall title.

Portraits Suni Lee, The Olympic Gold Medalist in Her Daily Life

Gymnast Sunisa Lee of Team USA took home the women's all-around gold medal on June 29.

She was the first Hmong-American Olympian, the first woman of Asian descent, and the first Asian-American woman to win an Olympic overall title.

View this post on Instagram

A post shared by Sunisa Lee (@sunisalee)

To know her better, here is her profile!

Check this out!

Suni Lee's full name is Sunisa Phabsomphou.

She was born on March 9, 2003, in Saint Paul, Minnesota.

Her parents: Yeev Thoj (mother) and John Lee (father, who is not her biological father but raised her since age 2).

Suni has five siblings: Shyenne, Evionn, Lucky, Noah, and Justin.

She started Gymnastics in 2009, at age 6. Her father built a balance beam in their backyard for her to practice.

Olympic Career
2020 Tokyo Olympics:

  • Gold Medal: All-around
  • Silver Medal: Team
  • Bronze Medal: Uneven Bars
  • Notable Performance: Replaced Simone Biles on floor exercise in the team final after Biles withdrew due to injury

Suni Lee's remarkable journey in gymnastics has made her a household name. Her achievements continue to inspire and captivate audiences worldwide.

scraped_articles.title: 60 Funny Christian Jokes That Are Truly Hilarious and Clean
scraped_articles.meta_description: Looking for a good laugh? Check out these clean and funny Christian jokes.
scraped_articles.content:
60 Funny Christian Jokes That Are Truly Hilarious and Clean

Laughter is a gift that makes life better. Funny Christian jokes can bring smiles to faces and joy to hearts. They are light, clean, and perfect for sharing with family or friends. A good joke can brighten someone’s day without hurting anyone.

Funny Christian jokes are great for many moments in life. They can lighten a busy workday, make a road trip more fun, or bring laughs during a coffee break. A little humor during tough times or quiet evenings can help people feel better and connect with others.

In this article, we will share some great, clean, and funny Christian jokes that every kids and adults will love. We gathered these hilarious jokes from various sources, Thursday (12/6/2025). Let the laughter begin with these funny Christian jokes!

The Best and Funny Christian Jokes

1. How does Moses make his coffee? Hebrews it.

2. Who was the smartest man in the Bible? Abraham. He knew a Lot.

3. What did Jonah's family say when he told them about what happened before reaching Nineveh? "Hmm, sounds fishy."

4. Why couldn't Jonah trust the ocean? There was something fishy about it.

5. Where was Solomon's temple located? On the side of his head.

6. How do you make Holy Water? You take some regular water, and boil the devil out of it.

7. What did God do to cure Moses' headache? He gave him two tablets.

8. How long did Cain dislike his brother? As long as he was Abel.

9. What kind of man was Boaz before he married Ruth? Ruthless.

10. Why is David considered the best babysitter in the Bible? He rocked Goliath to sleep.

11. How do we know Peter was a rich fisherman? By his net income.

12. What did Adam say the day before Christmas? "It's Christmas, Eve!"

13. Why did Moses cross the Red Sea? To get to the other side.

14. What do you call a sleepwalking nun? A roamin' Catholic.

15. What was Moses' wife, Zipphora, known as when she'd throw dinner parties? "The hostess with the Moses."

16. Who was the fastest runner in the Bible? Adam. He was first in the human race.

17. What types of boats do believers want to go on? Discipleship and worship.

18. What excuse did Adam give to his children as to why he no longer lived in Eden? Your mother ate us out of house and home.

19. Why wouldn't the Pharaoh let the Hebrews go? He was in de-Nile.

20. What did pirates call Noah's boat? "The arrrrrrk."

More Hilarious Christian Jokes

21. How do pastors like their orange juice? With pulpit.

22. What do they call pastors in Germany? German Shepherds.

23. What did the classmate say when asked why they kept walking next to the same person at school? "I was told I'm supposed to walk by Faith!"

24. What kind of car would Jesus drive? A Christler.

25. What do you call a Bible character who just pulled into church? A parking Lot.

26. Why didn't anyone want to fight Goliath? It seemed like a giant ordeal.

27. Which king liked to do things on his own? Solomon.

28. What did Daniel tell his real estate agent? "I'd prefer a house with no den."

29. What's a believer's favorite fruit? Spiritual.

30. Who in the Bible had the greatest business plans? The prophets.

31. Which book of the major prophets is the easiest to understand? EZekiel.

32. Which minor prophet is well-known thanks to cookies? Famous Amos.

33. What did Adam say to Eve when handing her something to wear? "Take it or leaf it."

34. When someone needed a boat made, what did the people in town say? "We Noah guy."

35. What did Zachariah do when he and Elizabeth had disagreements? He gave the silent treatment.

36. How did Paul greet his friend? "Give me Phi-lemon!"

37. What did the lawyer ask when someone started talking about God's will? "Was it notarized?"

38. What's a miracle that can be done by a complainer? Turning anything into whine.

39. What size was the lumber that was made to build the ark? 2x2.

40. How would you rate Jael's camping skills? Tent out of tent.

Funny Christian Jokes for Kids

41. How do angels greet each other? They say halo.

42. What animal did Noah find hard to trust on his ark? The cheetah!

43. Why did the sponge go to church? It was hole-y.

44. Why couldn't the Israelites initially enter the Promised Land? It wasn't the Pinky Promised Land.

45. Why didn't Noah go fishing? He only had two worms.

46. What did Adam say when he was asked his favorite holiday? "It's Christmas, Eve."

47. What did God's people say when food fell from Heaven? "Oh man-na!"

48. Why didn't they play cards on the ark? Noah was always standing on the deck.

49. Why did Adam and Eve do math every day? They were told to be fruitful and multiply.

50. How do you know that atoms are Catholic? They have mass.

51. What's loved by Noah and also most meat-eaters? Ham.

52. Which nursery song would Jesus have heard the most? "Mary Had a Little Lamb."

53. What did the family members say when asked who would say grace? "Grace."

54. Which Bible character was the best musician? Samson—he brought the house down.

55. What do you call a prophet who's also a chef? Habakkuk.

56. What's a Christian's favorite card game? Eucharist.

57. How did Jacob cheer on his grandson? "You're the Manasseh!"

58. At what time of day was Adam created? A little before Eve.

59. What type of lights did Noah have on the Ark? Floodlights.

60. Why did the hawk sit on the church steeple? It was a bird of pray.

scraped_articles.content:
5 Car Racing Movies List 2000s That Bring Adrenaline Rush to Your Screen

Let's grab some popcorn, buckle up, and prepare for a cinematic adrenaline rush with these car racing movies. (Photo: pinterest/Nerea DC)

5 Car Racing Movies List 2000s That Bring Adrenaline Rush to Your Screen

Car racing movies have always been a favorite genre for film enthusiasts.

This list is suited for those who enjoy the thrill of speed, competition, and adrenaline-pumping action. These car racing movies offer a unique insight into motorsports. It ranges from intense races on the track to dramatic behind-the-scenes stories.

This list will explore five car racing movies from the 2000s that will bring an adrenaline rush to your screen.




Car Racing Movies List 2000s

  • Genre: Sport/Action
  • IMDb: 8,1/10
  • Rotten Tomatoes: 92%

1. Ford v Ferrari (2019)

This biographical drama tells the true story of the battle between Ford and Ferrari at the 1966 24 Hours of Le Mans race. "Ford v Ferrari" is starring Matt Damon and Christian Bale. This film captures the excitement and tension of competitive racing. You can watch it on Amazon Prime Video or Google Play Movies.

pinterest/Fawzan Khan

2. Gran Turismo (2023)

  • Genre: Sport/Action
  • IMDb: 7,1/10
  • Rotten Tomatoes: 65%

Set to be released in 2023, Gran Turismo promises to bring the popular video game franchise to the big screen.

It will make you feel high-speed races and stunning visuals. This movie is sure to appeal to fans of the game and racing enthusiasts alike. Keep an eye out for its release in theaters or streaming platforms.

3. Senna (2010)

  • Genre: Sport/Drama
  • IMDb: 8,5/10
  • Rotten Tomatoes: 93%

This documentary film follows the life and career of Brazilian racing legend Ayrton Senna.

He presents an intimate look at his rise to fame and tragic death. With archival footage and interviews, Senna provides a captivating insight into the world of Formula 1 racing. You can watch it on Netflix or Hulu.

4. Winning: The Racing Life of Paul Newman (2015)

  • Genre: Documentary/Sport
  • IMDb: 7,6/10
  • Rotten Tomatoes: 92%

This documentary explores the lesser-known passion of Hollywood icon Paul Newman for auto racing. The film shows Newman's journey from amateur racer to professional driver through interviews and footage. This movie highlights his love for the sport. You can stream it on platforms like Netflix or YouTube. IMDb

5. Italian Race (2016)

  • Genre: Sport/Action
  • IMDb: 7,2/10
  • Rotten Tomatoes: 86%

This Italian film follows the story of a talented young car racer who dreams of making it big in the competitive world of motorsports.

With stunning cinematography and thrilling race sequences, Italian Race offers a gripping look into the challenges and triumphs of pursuing a career in racing. You can watch it on Amazon Prime Video or Google Play Movies.

These car racing movies from the 2000s present various stories and perspectives on motorsports.

Do you love high-speed races or dramatic biopics? These car racing movies will keep you on the edge. Let's grab some popcorn, buckle up, and prepare for a cinematic adrenaline rush with these car racing movies.

Take advantage of the action-packed excitement—stream or watch these films on various platforms to experience the racing from home. Happy watching!

Car Racing Movies List 2000s

5 Narnia Movies List: A Cinematic Adventures in Fantasy World

The Narnia series of movies has been a delight to audiences for years with its magical world and epic adventures.

These Narnia movies have brought C.S. Lewis' beloved books to life on the big screen. This article will explore five Narnia movies that have taken us on thrilling journeys through the fantasy world.





Narnia Movies List

1. The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe (2005)

  • IMDb: 6,9
  • Rotten Tomatoes: 75%

This movie follows the Pevensie siblings as they discover a magical wardrobe that leads them to the land of Narnia.

They must join forces with Aslan, the noble lion, to defeat the evil White Witch and save Narnia from eternal winter. You can watch this movie on Disney+.

  • IMDb: 6,5
  • Rotten Tomatoes: 66%

In this sequel, the Pevensie siblings return to Narnia to help Prince Caspian reclaim his rightful throne from his evil uncle.

2. The Chronicles of Narnia: Prince Caspian (2008)

Together, they face epic battles and challenges to restore peace to the land. You can watch it on Disney Plus, Amazon Video, Microsoft Store, AMC on Demand, Apple TV, Google Play Movies, YouTube, and Vudu.

  • IMDb: 6,3
  • Rotten Tomatoes: 50%

3. The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader (2010)

In this third installment, Edmund and Lucy Pevensie are joined by their cousin Eustace as they take a seafaring adventure aboard the Dawn Treader with King Caspian. Together, they encounter mythical creatures and face dangerous challenges to find the seven lost Lords of Narnia. You can stream it on Hulu.

4. The Chronicles of Narnia: The Silver Chair (canceled film)

Unfortunately, the fourth installment of the series, "The Silver Chair," was announced but later canceled. This movie would have followed Eustace Scrubb and his friend Jill Pole as they embark on a quest to find Prince Rilian, who has gone missing in Narnia. Hopefully, this film will be made one day, and fans can see this adventure come to life on the big screen.

  • IMDb: 7,2
  • Google users: 92%

This classic TV movie adaptation of C.S. Lewis' beloved book follows the four Pevensie siblings.

5. The Lion, the Witch & the Wardrobe (1988)

They discover the magical land of Narnia through a wardrobe in their uncle's house. They must work together to defeat the White Witch and bring peace to Narnia again. You can watch this movie on Amazon Prime Video.

The Narnia movies have brought us incredible journeys filled with magic, adventure, and bravery.

Whether you're a longtime fan of the books or new to the world of Narnia, these movies are sure to delight audiences of all ages with their fantastical worlds. Let's grab some popcorn, settle in, and engage yourself in the beautiful world of Narnia through these cinematic adventures. Happy watching!

scraped_articles.title: 60 Hiking Quotes: Motivational And Funny Words To Inspire Your Next Adventure
scraped_articles.meta_description: These motivational and funny hiking quotes will inspire you to go to your next exciting adventure in the nature.
scraped_articles.content:
60 Hiking Quotes: Motivational And Funny Words To Inspire Your Next Adventure

60 Hiking Quotes: Motivational And Funny Words To Inspire Your Next Adventure

Are you a fan of hiking? Do you enjoy the beauty of nature and the sense of adventure that comes with it? If so, you're in for a treat! In this article, we will explore some great hiking quotes that will inspire and uplift you on your outdoor adventures.

Hiking quotes have a way of capturing the essence of the great outdoors and the joy of exploration. They often remind us of the beauty and simplicity of nature and the peace that can be found in the solitude of the wilderness.

Whether you're a seasoned hiker or someone who just enjoys a leisurely stroll in nature, these hiking quotes are sure to resonate with you. They offer wisdom, motivation, and a sense of connection to the natural world.

So, if you're in need of some inspiration for your next hike, here are some great hiking quotes for you. We collected these quotes from various sources, Thursday (28/12/2023). Let them guide you as you set out to admire the beauty of nature and explore the world around you.

A. Short Hiking Quotes

1. "The best view comes after the hardest climb."

2. "Hike more, worry less."

3. "Every mountain top is within reach if you just keep climbing."

4. "In every walk with nature one receives far more than he seeks." - John Muir

5. "The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step." - Lao Tzu

6. "In all things of nature there is something of the marvelous." - Aristotle

7. "The mountains are calling and I must go." - John Muir

8. "Carry as little as possible, but choose that little with care." - Earl Shaffer

9. "Hiking is a great passion of mine, and I find myself picking up empty bottles." - Sam Heughan

10. "Hiking and happiness go hand in hand (or foot in boot)." - Diane Spicer

11. "Where the heart loves, there the legs walk." - Maltese Proverb

12. "It's not the mountain we conquer, but ourselves." - Sir Edmund Hillary

13. "There are no shortcuts to any place worth going." – Beverly Sills

14. "After a day's walk, everything has twice its usual value." - G.M. Trevelyan

15. "A walk in nature walks the soul back home." - Mary Davis

16. "An early morning walk is a blessing for the whole day." - Henry David Thoreau

17. "Leave the road, take the trails." – Pythagoras

18. "All truly great thoughts are conceived by walking." - Friedrich Nietzsche

19. "Hiking in undiscovered places is a lot of fun." - Karolina Kurkova

20. "Wilderness is not a luxury but a necessity of the human spirit." - Edward Abbey

B. Inspirational Hiking Quotes

1. "The climb speaks to our character, but the view, I think, to our souls." - Lori Lansens

2. "Walk away quietly in any direction and taste the freedom of the mountaineer." - John Muir

3. "It isn't the mountain ahead that wears you out; it's the grain of sand in your shoe." - Robert W. Service

4. "The real voyage of discovery consists not in seeking new landscapes, but in having new eyes." - Marcel Proust

5. Of all the paths you take in life, make sure a few of them are dirt." - John Muir

6. "Everyone wants to live on top of the mountain, but all the happiness and growth occurs while you are climbing it." - Andy Rooney

7. "Never measure the height of a mountain until you have reached the top. Then you will see how low it was." - Dag Hammarskjold

8. "Climb the mountain so you can see the world, not so the world can see you." - David McCullough

9. "It's easier to go down a hill than up it but the view is much better at the top." - Henry Ward Beecher

10. "We don't stop hiking because we grow old, we grow old because we stop hiking."

11. "Two roads diverged in a wood and I – I took the one less traveled by, and that has made all the difference." - Robert Frost

12. "Hiking is a bit like life: The journey only requires you to put one foot in front of the other…again and again and again. And if you allow yourself the opportunity to be present throughout the entirety of the trek, you will witness beauty every step of the way, not just at the summit."

13. "May your dreams be larger than mountains and may you have the courage to scale their summits." - Harley King

14. "You have to hike up the mountain path to reach the summit. Thinking won't get you there." - Marty Rubin

15. "Nature is not a place to visit. It is home." - Gary Snyder

16. "May your trails be crooked, winding, lonesome, dangerous, leading to the most amazing view." - Edward Abbey

17. "Walking is a man's best medicine." - Hippocrates

18. "Returning home is the most difficult part of long-distance hiking; you have grown outside the puzzle and your piece no longer fits." - Cindy Ross

19. "A walk in nature walks the soul back home." - Mary Davis

20. "Happiness is not at the top of the mountain, but in how to climb it."

C. Funny Hiking Quotes

1. "I go hiking because I need to get my steps in to justify eating a big meal later."

2. "I don't need therapy, I just need to go hiking."

3. "The best view comes after the hardest climb. Or at least that's what I tell myself while huffing and puffing up the trail."

4. "Hiking: where getting lost is not a problem, it's an adventure."

5. "An adventure a day keeps the doctor away."

6. "Mountains have a way of dealing with overconfidence." - Nemann Buhl

7. "I have two doctors, my left leg and my right." - G.M. Trevelyan

8. "Getting to the top is optional. Getting down is mandatory." - Ed Viesturs

9. "Hiking is the best workout! You can hike for three hours and not even realize you're working out. And, hiking alone lets me have some time to myself." - Jamie Luner

10. "I told the mountain my problems, but it just peaked away!"

11. "Hiking was the answer – can't remember what the question was."

12. "Bring a compass. It's awkward when you have to eat your friends. "

13. "Hiking is the only slightly less ugly stepsister of running." - Lindy Hughes

14. "Always hike with someone in worse shape than you. The bears out there will know. "

15. "I took a walk in the woods and came out taller than the trees." - Henry David Thoreau

16. "Hiking is just walking where it's okay to pee." - Demetri Martin

17. "I like being near the top of a mountain. One can't get lost here." - Wislawa Szymborska

18. "Never follow someone else's path unless you're in the woods and you're lost, and you see a path. By all means, you should follow that." - Ellen DeGeneres

19. "Why is it that it is only after reaching the top that I realize I have to hike back down?"

20. "Following my heart got me lost. Next time, I'm following the trail markers."

scraped_articles.title: A Horse Escapes from a Cage on an Airplane at 30,000 Feet
scraped_articles.meta_description: A Horse Escapes from a Cage on an Airplane at 30,000 Feet
scraped_articles.content:
A Horse Escapes from a Cage on an Airplane at 30,000 Feet

A Horse Escapes from a Cage on an Airplane at 30,000 Feet

A Boeing 747 cargo jet was forced to turn around after a horse escaped from its stable and caused chaos while the plane was airborne at 30,000 feet (9,144m).

According to a BBC report, the plane was bound for Belgium from New York but turned back about 90 minutes after departure when the animal broke free.

Air traffic control audio recorded the pilot saying: "We have a live animal, a horse, on board. The horse managed to escape."

"We can't secure the horse back."

The pilot, flying Air Atlanta Iceland flight number 4592, told air traffic controllers that the aircraft was fine, but the escaped horse was his concern.

He then had a veterinarian meet the plane upon landing at John F Kennedy International Airport.

When the plane returned from last Thursday's incident, the pilot said he needed to dump 20 tons of fuel "east of Nantucket", a popular enclave for the wealthy near Massachusetts.

The plane was forced to dump fuel due to its weight.

It is still unclear how Houdini's horse managed to get out, but he was uncontrollable when the plane landed at the airport.

"Do you need assistance?" the air traffic controller asked the pilot after the plane arrived.

"On the ground, negative," the pilot replied. "On the road, yes. Our horse is in trouble, in trouble."

The flight took off the same day and successfully arrived at Liege Airport on Friday, November 10, according to FlightRadar24.

Air Atlanta Iceland waited to respond to the BBC's request for comment.

Why the horse was transported also remains unknown.

According to experts, one of the most common reasons is the transportation of racing horses.


"You have first class, business class and economy class," one source told CNN, referring to the different stable size options available for the animals.

scraped_articles.title: Brittany Renner: What Causes Her Recent Divorce with Kevin Gate?
scraped_articles.meta_description: Social media influencer Brittany Renner has announced her divorce from rapper Kevin Gates after 52 days of marriage.
scraped_articles.content:
Brittany Renner: What Causes Her Recent Divorce with Kevin Gate?

Brittany Renner, a 33-year-old social media influencer, recently announced her separation from rapper Kevin Gates after 52 days of their marriage.

Their wedding took place on April 6 and ended on May 28, 2025.

In an interview with Los Angeles radio station REAL 92.3 LA published on Saturday, June 7, the influencer and Basketball Wives star said that she and the rapper, 39, divorced after 52 days of marriage. 

“We got married April 6 and divorced May 28,” Renner, 33, said.

Brittany Renner explained that their divorce followed Islamic legal procedures, which include a 90-day waiting period for conciliation and to determine the possibility of pregnancy.

During this waiting period, she is promised to focus on herself and not to enter into a romantic relationship with anyone.

Despite the split, Renner stated that he has no regrets about his decision and feels that he followed his heart.

He also expressed his gratitude towards Islam, which he said has greatly improved his life.

#BrittanyRenner reveals she & #KevinGates are divorced after being married for 52 days. 🏀 #BasketballWives pic.twitter.com/kxCsDDCnqM

— jay (@JaysRealityBlog) June 8, 2025

What Cause The Divorce?

Renner, who recently converted to Islam, reassured her fans that “all is well” despite her marriage ending.

“I don't feel like it's a sucky situation because what is meant to be is always going to be,” she said. 

Renner also asserted that she has no regrets about the situation.

“I followed my heart and that’s what more than most people can say, and I think when you do that, you get all the clarity you need and there’s no stone left unturned and there's no regret,” she said. 

Kevin Gates has not publicly commented on the divorce as of the latest reports

Before marrying Kevin Gates, Renner was known for her relationships with several NBA athletes, including P.J. Washington, who is the father of Renner's child.

He is also active on social media, with over 4 million followers on Instagram and a significant presence on other platforms such as TikTok.

Renner currently stars in the 12th season of the television show Basketball Wives.

X/Twitter Is Now Officially Allow Adult Content?

X/Twitter now allow "labelled" NSFW content, except in profile pictures and banners.

As reported by TechCrunch, X/Twitter has updated a new policy that is also allowing the nudity and adult content, despite being long-known to let users share those NSFW contents.

The difference is, this time users must labelling their "adult content" and avoid use the content in profile pictures or banners.

“We have launched Adult Content and Violent Content policies to bring more clarity of our Rules and transparency into enforcement of these areas."

"These policies replace our former Sensitive Media and Violent Speech policies - but what we enforce against hasn’t changed," @safety account said.

We have launched Adult Content and Violent Content policies to bring more clarity of our Rules and transparency into enforcement of these areas. These policies replace our former Sensitive Media and Violent Speech policies - but what we enforce against hasn’t changed.
